mapper.select: SELECT * FROM news ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news (title, summary, content, image_url, category, views, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{summary}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{category}, #{views}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, category = #{category}, views = #{views} WHERE id = #{id}
